Spells-Bard — Female Human Bard: 10
Strength: 7 (-2) Dexterity: 13 (1) Constitution: 9 (-1) Intelligence: 11 (0) Wisdom: 12 (1) Charisma: 9 (-1)
Background: Entertainer Alignment: Lawful Good Deity: Celtic-Manannan Mac Lir (LN)
Ability Boosts: Intelligence Experience: 66604/85000 Level: 10 Size: Medium Speed: 30 Carry/Lift: 105/210

Ability Boosts: 1 to distribute
Jack Of All Trades: +2 on non-proficient ability checks
Features/Skills
Proficiency Bonus: 4
Feat Count: General: 2 Selectable Feature Count: Bard (Bard College)
Feats: Resilient; Skilled Human Features: Human Ability Adjustment; Language (Common; Choose 1 from any) Bard Features: Armor Proficiency (Light); Bard College; Bardic Inspiration; Bonus Proficiencies (College Of Valor); Bonus Skills; College Of Valor; Combat Inspiration; Countercharm; Expertise (Bard); Extra Attack; Font Of Inspiration; Jack Of All Trades; Magical Secrets; Save Proficiency (Dexterity; Charisma); Skill Proficiency (Choose 3 from any); Song Of Rest; Spellcasting; Tool Proficiency (Choose 3 from any Musical); Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons; Hand Crossbow; Longsword; Rapier; Shortsword) Entertainer Features: By Popular Demand; Skill Proficiency (Acrobatics; Performance); Tool Proficiency (Disguise Kit; Choose 1 from any Musical)
Feature Notes:
Bard College: 1 selection
Font Of Inspiration: Bardic Inspiration refreshes after a short rest
Bardic Inspiration: R60' Can use a bonus action to give an ally a +1d10 bonus on an ability, attack, or saving throw within 10 min once per short rest
By Popular Demand: Can receive welcome and lodging in exchange for performing
Skill Proficiency: Acrobatics; Insight; Intimidation; Performance; Persuasion; Religion; Sleight Of Hand; Survival

Magic
Spell Slots: B0: 4; B1: 4; B2: 3; B3: 3; B4: 3; B5: 2 Attack: B: 3 Spell DC: B: 11
Spells:
Animal Friendship (B1 Ench): R30' Convinces target beast that self is harmless (save Wisdom neg; Intelligence 4 or higher immune) for 1 day or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Animal Messenger (B2 Ench): R30' Tiny beast target moves to deliver a 25-word message to a described recipient for 1 day [+Level extends the duration +2 days] [R]
Animate Objects (B5 Tran): R120' 10 small, 5 medium, 2 large, or 1 huge objects obey mental commands when within 500' for concentration up to 1 min [+Level animates +2 objects]
Awaken (B5 Tran): Touched beast or plant gains Intelligence 10, speech, and movement and becomes charmed for 30 days or until harmed
Bane (B1 Ench): R30' 3 targets suffer -1d4 on attacks and saving throws (save Charisma neg) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Bestow Curse (B3 Necr): Touched suffers a choice of disadvantage on specified ability rolls, disadvantage on attacks on self, requiring a successful Wisdom save to take any action, or +1d8 HP necrotic from self attacks (save Wisdom neg) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the maximum duration to 10 min, 8 hr, 24 hr, or permanently at level 4, 5, 7, or 9]
Blade Ward (B0 Abju): Self gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing weapon damage for 1 rd
Blindness/Deafness (B2 Necr): R30' Inflicts a choice of blindness or deafness (save Constitution ends) for 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Calm Emotions (B2 Ench): R60' 20' radius suppresses a choice of charm and fright or hostility (save Charisma neg) for concentration up to 1 min
Charm Person (B1 Ench): R30' Target regards self as a friend (save Wisdom neg) for 1 hr or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Clairvoyance (B3 Divi): R1 mile Self can see or hear through an invisible sensor for concentration up to 10 min
Cloud Of Daggers (B2 Conj): R60' 5' cube inflicts 4d4 HP slashing for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +2d4 HP]
Comprehend Languages (B1 Divi): Self understands all languages for 1 hr [R]
Compulsion (B4 Ench): R30' Self controls target movement direction (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min

Cure Wounds (B1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8-1 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Dancing Lights (B0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights dimly light a 10' radius and can move 60' per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Detect Magic (B1 Divi): R30' Reveals magic auras and their schools for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Detect Thoughts (B2 Divi): R30' Reveals targets' surface thoughts and allows probing deeper (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Dimension Door (B4 Conj): Teleports self and 1 adjacent willing creature up to 500'
Disguise Self (B1 Illu): Changes the appearance of self body and clothing for 1 hr; physical investigation detects the illusion
Dispel Magic (B3 Abju): R120' Ends the effects on the target of a spell up to level 3, and successful DC 10 + spell level checks end each higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Dissonant Whispers (B1 Ench): R60' Inflicts 3d6 HP psychic and forces the target to use its reaction to flee (save Wisdom half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]

Dominate Person (B5 Ench): R60' Target humanoid obeys telepathic commands (save Wisdom neg; damage allows another save) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the duration to 10 min, 1 hr, or 8 hr at level 6, 7, or 8]
Dream (B5 Illu): Touched controls the dreams of a known target for 8 hr and can inflict 3d6 HP psychic (save Wisdom neg)
Enhance Ability (B2 Tran): Touched gains advantage on chosen ability checks for concentration up to 1 hr; Constitution also gives 2d6 temporary HP, Strength doubles carrying capacity, and Dexterity negates damage from a 20' fall [+Level affects +1 target]

True Seeing (B6 Divi): Touched gains 120' truesight, sees magically concealed doors, and can see into the Ethereal Plane for 1 hr
True Strike (B0 Divi): R30' Self gains advantage on the next attack on the target within 1 rd

Vicious Mockery (B0 Ench): R60' Inflicts 2d4 HP psychic and disadvantage on the next attack (save Wisdom neg) for 1 rd
Zone Of Truth (B2 Ench): R60' Creatures in a 15' radius cannot lie (save Charisma neg) for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Countercharm: R30' Performance gives friendly listeners advantage on saves vs. charm and fright for 1 rd
Magical Secrets: Can learn 2 additional spells from any class
Song Of Rest: Friendly listeners regain +1d8 hit points from spending Hit Dice after a short rest
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the bard spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
